destinations.title: We require below documents for furthur assessment of your claim. You may submit the same at any of our ICICI Prudentiol Branch office near your or e-mail the same at Claimcore@iciciprulife.com

destinations.descriptionOne: Current Medical Records (admission rates, discharge summary, indoor case papers

destinations.descriptionTwo: Indoor Case paper Histopathology reports Biopsy report

destinations.descriptionThree: Prior medical records of insured/Life Assured

destinations.descriptionFour: First Consultation for Cancer Lung diagnose Histopathology Report Biopsy Report All Radiology Report

destinations.descriptionFive: Prior medical records of Insured/Life Assured

destinations.descriptionSix: All Pathology reports && Other life insurance policy if any

destinations.descriptionEignt: Any document pertaining to the death or sequence of death of the Life Assured
